The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 07 April is 266,499 (30,715.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 April, there were 6,346 new confirmed cases (731.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 March, there were 8,803 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 28% (2,457 fewer cases).
